title: Newly discovered Medusavirus give new insights on how organisms and viruses co-evolved

title_detail.value: Newly discovered Medusavirus give new insights on how organisms and viruses co-evolved

summary: Researchers find a new giant virus in the hot springs of northern Japan. It's unique genetic makeup of histones and capsid proteins brings new insight into virus evolution.

summary_detail.value: Researchers find a new giant virus in the hot springs of northern Japan. It's unique genetic makeup of histones and capsid proteins brings new insight into virus evolution.
